DOC.detailed_description: The ideal management hemiplegic shoulder pain ( HSP ) prevention , normal limb position necessary prevent reduce hemiplegic shoulder pain.The foam board support use prevent shoulder pain could recommend wheelchair user keep normal position . Therefore , investigator design equipment wheelchair handrail compensator expect help paralyze limbs maintain normal position.Using wheelchair handrail compensator may help patient achieve : pain relieve , improvement upper limb function increase quality life.The aim study evaluate effect treatment wheelchair handrail compensator rehabilitation training people hemiplegic shoulder pain .
